类 StoreOrderController

java.lang.Object
application.project4_pizzaordermanager.StoreOrderController
public class StoreOrderController extends Object
Controller for StoreOrderView that handles order cancellation and exporting.
作者:
Yuchen Wei, Denghao Sun

  • 方法详细资料

    • findOrderInList

      private Order findOrderInList(String number)
      The method to find if the given order is already in the order list. Compare the given customer number with the one saved.
      参数:
      number - of the customer.
      返回:
      the order in the order list if it is found; otherwise, null if it is not found.

    • setPrice

      private void setPrice()
      Update and set the price for the order total to their corresponding text filed.

    • initializeComboBox

      private void initializeComboBox()
      Initialize the ComboBox for choosing customer's phone number in the order list.

    • initializeListView

      private void initializeListView()
      Initialize the ListView for pizzas in the selected order.

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(MainController controller)
      Get data from the main controller and initialize the View.
      参数:
      controller - passed from the MainController Class

    • onNumberChange

      protected void onNumberChange()
      Initialize the list view and call the setPrice() method to set the price to the text filed.

    • onCancelOrder

      protected void onCancelOrder()
      Cancel the order selected.

    • exportOrder

      private void exportOrder(File file) throws IOException
      Export the order information to a text file.
      参数:
      file - selected by the user.
      抛出:
      IOException - when the file is not found.

    • onExportOrder

      protected void onExportOrder() throws IOException
      Export the selected order information to a text file chosen by the user.
      抛出:
      IOException - when the file is not found.
